attributes.action: Lift visa requirements to Ukrainians fleeing conflict.
attributes.background: Lift visa requirements to Ukrainians fleeing conflict. Britain has left the european union regulation yet is still politically and geographically connected to europe. We have not forgotton our humanity.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
